headings.usage: All headings (h1-h6), hero text, big numbers

mono.usage: Code snippets, data values, technical details

rules: Headings MUST be bold (font-bold or font-black).
Headings MUST use tight tracking (tracking-tight or tracking-tighter).
Body text should be readable with relaxed leading (leading-relaxed).

textures.noise: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")

buttons.base: inline-flex items-center justify-center whitespace-nowrap rounded-lg text-sm font-medium ring-offset-background transition-all focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50
buttons.primary: bg-neo-black text-white border-2 border-neo-black shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] hover:translate-x-[2px] hover:translate-y-[2px] hover:shadow-[2px_2px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] active:translate-x-[4px] active:translate-y-[4px] active:shadow-none
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-neo-black border-2 border-neo-black shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] hover:translate-x-[2px] hover:translate-y-[2px] hover:shadow-[2px_2px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] active:translate-x-[4px] active:translate-y-[4px] active:shadow-none

cards.base: bg-white border-2 border-neo-black rounded-xl shadow-[6px_6px_0px_0px_rgba(0,0,0,1)] p-6

inputs.base: flex h-12 w-full rounded-lg border-2 border-neo-black bg-white px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-neo-black focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts links to the index.html or import them in index.css immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to include the 'neo' colors and 'Lexend Mega'/'Public Sans' font families.
3. OVERRIDE SHADCN: When using Shadcn components, YOU MUST override their default styles to match the 'Neubrutalism' rules (thick borders, hard shadows). Do not use the default subtle styles.
4. USE LUCIDE ICONS: Use lucide-react for all icons. Keep them bold (stroke-width={2.5} or {3}).
5. NO GRADIENTS: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid bold colors or the noise texture.
6. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
7. ANIMATIONS: Use 'framer-motion' for entrance animations. Elements should slide up and fade in with a spring physics feel.
8. MARQUEE: Use 'react-fast-marquee' for the client logos section.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' - generic, centered, low-contrast designs.
Every interaction needs a micro-animation (hover, click).
Don't ask the user for clarification. Make decisions.
If a flow is missing (e.g., auth), mock it or build a simple version.
